body_html:
Here are some numbers for various calls to var(dim) (thanks for the %timeit tip!) https://gist.github.com/zou3519/c301985417b0f22f6c34ff814d583008

In general after the numeric stability changes the calls are slower. The largest difference (new_time / old_time) is around 1.7

body:
Here are some numbers for various calls to `var(dim)` (thanks for the %timeit tip!) https://gist.github.com/zou3519/c301985417b0f22f6c34ff814d583008

In general after the numeric stability changes the calls are slower. The largest difference (new_time / old_time) is around 1.7
